section.title: Ironic Guest OS Support
section.para: A Verified Guest OS has been tested by &vendor; and appears to function properly as a bare metal instance on &kw-hos-phrase;.

A Certified Guest OS has been officially tested by the operating system vendor, or by &vendor; under the vendor's authorized program, and will be supported by the operating system vendor as a bare metal instance on &kw-hos-phrase;.
